name: Wolfia
headline: We help your sales teams become product experts instantly
description:
Wolfia help your sales teams become product experts instantly. Using AI, we help answer customer sales questions, security questionnaires, and RFPs instantly without having to rely on an internal expert. 

Fast growing companies like Amplitude, CircleCI, Peregrine, and Sardine use Wolfia to accelerate their sales cycles and unblock deals.

founders.name: Naren Manoharan, Cofounder
founders.description: Cofounder and CEO of Wolfia. Prior to Wolfia, Naren led the infrastructure engineering teams at Wealthfront and has a Masters in CS (specializing in AI and Machine Learning)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Wolfia**

Founded in 2022 and leveraging the backing of Y Combinator’s Batch S22, Wolfia is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission: "We help your sales teams become product experts instantly." 

In a world where sales teams often drown in product details, security questionnaires, and Request for Proposals (RFPs), Wolfia stands out by utilizing AI to deliver instant, expert-quality knowledge. This means sales representatives can skip the lengthy call to an internal expert and get the answers they need right away, streamlining their workflows and boosting efficiency.

**Growing Fast, Trusted by Leading Companies**

Companies like Amplitude, CircleCI, Peregrine, and Sardine have integrated Wolfia into their sales processes, resulting in faster sales cycles and unblocked deals. The testimonials from users highlight the transformative impact of the solution; for instance, one client noted a fourfold increase in their ability to handle security questions—empowered to do so without relying heavily on their in-house experts.

**The Team and Talent Behind Wolfia**

Wolfia is a lean operation with a team of just two employees, led by a vision clearly articulated by Group Partner Michael Seibel. Despite its size, the company has been effective in delivering on its promise of turning complex sales scenarios into straightforward, actionable insights.

**Features and Offerings**

Wolfia's platform enables sales teams to rapidly answer client inquiries and fill out lengthy questionnaires through its AI-powered agent. This tool not only collects and presents knowledge but also evolves over time, building a comprehensive repository of information that’s readily accessible.

For those interested in exploring what Wolfia has to offer, the company has a wealth of resources available on its website, including documentation, case studies, and a blog aimed at enriching user knowledge and showcasing success stories.

**Conclusion: A Game-Changer for Sales Teams**

In summary, Wolfia is not just another tech startup; it’s a powerful ally for sales teams striving to become experts in their products on demand. By alleviating the pressure of intricate paperwork—think security reviews and RFPs—it lets sales professionals focus on what they do best: selling. 

Check them out at [wolfia.com](https://www.wolfia.com).
